text.intro: Twitterverse of Belgrade anti-government protests against media censorship, political violence and rising autocracy in Serbia. There are 4958 nodes and 10298 edges. The network consists of tweets containing the hashtag #1od5miliona, posted between December 25,  and December 29. Two nodes are linked if one user retweets another user's tweet. The network is driven by opposition parties and opposition politicians, and there is no visible pro- and anti-regime polarization.
text.title: Anti-government protests in Belgrade, December 29: #1od5miliona
